title: Roscoe Wallace, LBJ, Bruno Mars, Presidential Prediction and more.
itunes:title: Roscoe Wallace, LBJ, Bruno Mars, Presidential Prediction and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Roscoe Wallace is back and he gives us a treat. Lebron James eloquently responds to Trump's criticism. Could you see Bruno Mars as a model or nah? A university professor predicts Joe Biden's victory in November. Louisville's Chief of Police and Chief of Public Services walked out of a government oversight meeting. We have the secrets to Japanese longevity. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog drives the point home about US being the deciding factor at the polls 88 days from now. Go and vote!!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
